MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the  CH61 postcode area of Wirral, affecting properties in Tilstock Avenue, Beverley Road, Thorburn Close and surrounding streets. Our emergency response team has managed to restore power to a number of properties, and we are working to restore power for those customers still off supply. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of further network investigations and our team are now working to get the power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 10:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:35AM on 10th March 2021
